experiences.description: Developed and maintained ETL pipelines for data warehousing solutions. Worked with Python and SQL to extract, transform, and load data from various sources into a central data repository. Contributed to the design and implementation of data quality checks and monitoring systems. Gained experience in working with large datasets and optimizing query performance.

Designed and implemented data analytics tools using Java and Python. Collaborated with data scientists to develop machine learning models and integrate them into production systems. Built RESTful APIs for accessing data and analytics services. Contributed to the development of a cloud-based data platform using AWS.

Responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining core components of our flagship data analytics platform. Collaborates with the product team to translate requirements into scalable and efficient code. Ensures our software adheres to the highest quality standards. Primarily using Python, Docker, and Kubernetes on Azure.

education.description: Focused on algorithms, data structures, and software engineering principles. Participated in several group projects involving software development and system design.
Specialized in data mining and machine learning. Conducted research on anomaly detection in large datasets. Published a research paper on a novel anomaly detection algorithm.
